Test fails if the two columns of the first line are NOT the same. Otherwise, test passes only if the left column of the 2nd and 3rd lines is NOT decimal digits. If it is decimal digits (ie. the fallback) score as Partial. In all this IGNORE the suffix.

To see the ASCII decimal number associated with a row, mouse over it and the number will pop up in a tooltip.

PASS list marker is 九仟九百九拾九.
PASS list marker is 壹萬.
PASS list marker is 壹萬 壹.
